title: The Terrys
text:
The Terrys are an Australian indie rock band from Gerringong that formed in early 2020. The group consists of lead vocalist Jacob Finch, lead guitarist Lukas Anderson, rhythm guitarist Ben Salvatori, drummer Cameron Cooper and bassist Trent Cooper.
The band released their debut EP titled The TerrySonic Mixtape in September 2021. Their debut studio album, True Colour, was released in October 2022, and peaked at number 17 on the ARIA Charts in March 2023. They released their second album, Skate Pop, in February 2024.


== Members ==
Jacob Finch – vocals
Lukas Anderson – lead guitar
Ben Salvatori – rhythm guitar
Cameron Cooper – drums
Trent Cooper – bass guitar
